item.name: Control+Shift+I to Control-Option+Up
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::I, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R | ModifierFlag::OPTION_R

item.name: Control+Shift+K to Control-Option+Down
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R | ModifierFlag::OPTION_R

item.name: Control+Shift+J to Shift+Control+Left
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT

item.name: Control+Shift+L to Shift+Control+Right
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT

item.name: Control+Option+I to Shift+Control+Up
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::I, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R

item.name: Control+Option+K to Shift+Control+Down
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
